application.controllers

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controllers.MainController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookingController, FilmController, LoginController, NavbarController, UserController

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose:
    Parent class for all Controllers, governs transitions
    and globally available functionality such as logging out.
    Description:
    Contains methods for transitioning between different views,
    for linking buttons to transitions, for populating the global
    lists of Booking and Films used the program, for logging out,
    for logging issues in the program.
    Version:
    $Date: 2017/12/14 16:00:00 $
    Author:
    Zaid Al Lahham and Aleksi Anttila
